About Us

Hello Sissy!

I am Aldrin,

My love for travel has taken me from the bustling streets of Manila to the sunny shores of Florida! I started my journey as a working student, juggling my BA in Mathematics while dreaming of adventures. In 2016, I took the plunge into solo travel and found myself gazing at the Golden Gate Bridge on my first American trip—talk about a dream come true! Now, after years in banking, I’m all about helping you chase your travel dreams, one visa at a time. Let’s make those dreams happen—Another day, another visa!

My motto?

Confidence is always your best accessory; there's nothing else you need to wear well but your confidence.

Living my American dream!

since 2018

My American dream took flight after watching "On the Wings of Love" with Nadine Lustre and James Reid. Just like Nadine, I was captivated by the idea of seeing the Golden Gate Bridge, and guess what? I made it happen! Living in the U.S. has taught me the true meaning of hardship and perseverance. But what makes this journey truly special is my unwavering love for travel. From my humble beginnings in California, I’ve discovered that the world is my oyster, and my dream of exploring it is still alive and kicking!

So, whether it's a road trip across America or a flight to a distant land, I’m ready for the next adventure. After all, every corner of the world has a story waiting to be uncovered!
